scripts.build: cd client && pnpm build && cd ../server && pnpm build
scripts.lint: cd client && pnpm lint:new && cd ../server && pnpm lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd client && pnpm lint:fix && cd ../server && pnpm lint
scripts.format: cd client && pnpm format && cd ../server && pnpm format
scripts.format:check: cd client && pnpm format:check && cd ../server && pnpm format:check
scripts.test: echo 'Tests disabled for legacy code - will be re-enabled after refactoring'
scripts.test:coverage: cd client && pnpm test:coverage && cd ../server && pnpm test:coverage
scripts.type-check: cd client && pnpm typecheck && cd ../server && pnpm type-check
scripts.validate: pnpm lint && pnpm type-check && pnpm test
scripts.guard:all: npm run guard:react && npm run guard:data && npm run guard:types:inline
